description: Presentation on how to easily implement a Gitlab CI/CD for building and deploying a simple Python Flask application
This is a complete application with 3 components: a frontend in Angular, a backend in Flask and a scheduler in Celery
This is a command line tool, written in Golang, to download my favorite mangas. Can serve as a CLI template project.
This is a sample Java project, to provide a REST API. This template can be used for complex projects. Uses Spark and Nitrite.
And of course, what about seeing how this CV is made? Well, here you go.
